artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Gifuya Seishichi
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a cross-eyed man wearing black, yellow and green armor and brightly-patterned garments including blue garment with pink, light blue and yellow flowers; blue ground
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 応需玉桜芳年筆 {ōju Gyokuō Yoshitoshi hitsu}
text: Related to the play Ehon Taikōki絵本太功記, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 8th month of 1865.
title: Actor Bandō Shinsui as Takechi Mitsuhide
